title: Bud Light's latest attempt to right their wrongs is to give away free beer (just not to you)
description:
Bud Light sales fell 26% the week of April 22. It fell 21% before that and 11% before that. The week before THAT was when the company made viral titface performer Dylan Mulvaney a brand ambassador and the company's VP dissed customers as "fratty" and "out of touch."

So now they are giving away free beer. Not to you. To wholesalers.

[Consultant Bump WIlliams]: I don't think [Bud Light's VP] understood who the core Bud Light shopper was. When she came out with her comments, they were deemed as being derogatory, insulting and juvenile. And the Bud Light drinkers said, enough of that.'
Anheuser-Busch, the beer's parent company and America's largest brewer, said it will hand a free case over beer to every employee of its wholesaler network - which consists of many family-run businesses who've been badly hurt by the scandal.

People like the guy in this video, which came out early on in the controversy. When I wrote about it, I couldn't tell if this was real or if he was trolling. A few weeks and billions and billions of dollars later, turns out it was real and he was only the first.

Beer man struggling financially thanks to Anheuser-Busch going woke pic.twitter.com/ffTqWZEWHS
— Citizen Free Press (@CitizenFreePres) April 8, 2023
I've never seen such little sales in these past few days on these products. It's sad because if people don't buy this beer, I don't make money and I can't feed my family. It's kinda heartbreaking that Annheuiser Busch did what they did. They don't know their clientele. So it's kinda heartbreaking. Thanks, Annheisuer Busch. I may not be able to feed my family.

Call me crazy, but I don't think giving away free beer OF THE BEER THAT'S COSTING THEM THEIR LIVELIHOODS is going to make things right. Neither will commercials that are pandering to the point of insulting.

Anheuser-Busch might want to try the one thing they're trying their best to avoid. Three simple words: We Fucked Up.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Alex Jones shares what his Tucker Carlson sources tell him REALLY happened
description:
Alex Jones joined the show today and discussed the Tucker Carlson leaks. "Someone" has been leaking Tucker Carlson's b-roll and text messages to Media Matters. Yes, this Media Matters:

So Fox News is leaking Tucker Carlson videos to Media Matters as they attempt to run a smear campaign against him. Unfortunately for them, they make Tucker look like an absolute legend.

In one leaked video Tucker tells Media Matters to "go f*** yourself."

"His girlfriend was… pic.twitter.com/e8RVE2BQt2
— Paul Hookem 🇺🇸 (@PaulHook_em) May 2, 2023

Tucker abided by the NDA in his conversations with Alex. But other sources close to Tucker told Joens out of all the stories about Carlon's sudden ousting, the Vanity Fair story was closest to the truth. That was where (and I'm oversimplifying) Tucker was having dinner with Rupert Murdoch and his fiance. Tucker talked about how much he loved God. Rupert's fiance agreed that she loved both God AND Tucker. Atheist Rupert Murdoch who is freaked out by religious talk... freaked out. He dumped his fiance, and Carlson suddenly no longer has a home at Fox News.

Crowder and Alex had a long discussion about the other Tucker leaks, who's leaking, and a lot more on today's show.

title: Watch: Dude working drive-thru so high AF he bangs his head on microwave and forgets what customers are
description:
As someone who has been in a similar condition a time or two before, I can empathize with our viral friend here. The difference is I was in this condition while ordering at the Taco Bell drive-thru. Not working at the Taco Bell drive-thru.

Though the only thing my man here is working on is gravity.

Taco Bell employee appears to be high or on something while working 😳 pic.twitter.com/emxIsaSt7u
— Daily Loud (@DailyLoud) May 1, 2023

The question that remains is how this guy even made it to work. Was he ripping bong hits before having someone drop him off at work? Did he go to happy hour at Applebee's before work? Was he shooting up at work? Doesn't even know he's at work. All thoughts going through my head as his head goes crashing into the microwave door.

Eventually, he realizes someone staring at him and banging at the window to get his attention. Stoney McBaked was happy to have a friend to talk to. Until his new friend didn't care about how rough his day was and just wanted his Chalupa.

The look of confusion on Stoney's face why this man was being so mean to him almost led to tears.

Unclear is where his manager was at this time. Unless his manager drew the short straw and was in the bathroom doing what needed to be done to score their next fix while Stoney was left to run things.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: WATCH TODAY'S SHOW: TUCKER CARLSON'S LEAKED TEXTS REVEAL WHO HE REALLY IS!
description:
Tapes of Tucker Carlson got released and it makes people like him even more! 1,500 US soldiers are being sent to defend the southern border as title 42 is set to expire. Also, Gen Z is super gay. Alex Iones joins in 3rd chair. Tune in!

TUCKER TEXTS

  • Tucker Carlson caught on camera blasting Fox Nation before his firing.
  • Watch Tucker Carlson Blast Fox Nation Behind the Scenes: ‘The Site Sucks!’
  • In one leaked video Tucker tells Media Matters to "go f*** yourself."
  • Carlson’s Text That Alarmed Fox Leaders: ‘It’s Not How White Men Fight’

TROOPS TO BORDER

  • Pentagon holds briefing as U.S. prepares to deploy troops to southern border
  • Biden to Send 1,500 Troops to Mexican Border as Fears of Migrant Surge Grow
  • At last CNN reports on the border cataclysm
  • Karine Jean-Pierre is questioned about her lie that illegal immigration is down 90%
  • Unlawful entries along U.S.-Mexico border plummeted in January after expansion of migrant expulsions
  • Illegal border crossings jump ahead of Title 42 expiration
  • Fact Check: Illegal Immigration Down ‘90 Percent’ Thanks to Biden

DESANTIS WILL KILL PEDOS

  • Ron DeSantis: We're executing convicted pedos in Florida now
  • DeSantis expands Florida death penalty law, defying U.S. Supreme Court
  • Kennedy v. Louisiana

BOOK BANNING AGENDA

  • Over half of 2022's most challenged books have LGBTQ themes
  • Top 13 Most Challenged Books of 2022
  • Concern raised over sexually explicit book in Olathe, Kansas, seventh grade classroom
  • Biden welcomes trans TikToker to Oval Office after she sparked controversy for saying she WILL be a mom one day
  • Biden Has Held the Fewest News Conferences Since Reagan. Any Questions?
  • White House Defends Biden's 'Cheat Sheet' With Reporters' Questions
  • OLI LONDON: Trans TikToker who mocked women signed to agency that took $200,000 from DNC for Gen Z influencers to promote Biden's policy

title: Did you hear the one about the lesbian politician kicked out of a comedy club over her TERF gender beliefs?
description:
Stop me if you heard this one before. A Scottish lesbian MP walks into a comedy club. The bartender says, "Away with you, TERF! You make our staff afraid for their lives." That's the case with MP Joanna Cherry and a club called The Stand. And it's not a joke. If it were a joke I would say, "Why does the transgender refer to themselves as she/her? Because if they were her/she they'd be chocolate."

Cherry was scheduled to speak at the "Fringe Festival." Yet because she holds the antiquated belief that while all people deserve equal rights men can't just call themselves women, she is a transphobe and the staff at The Stand is terrified. So her event has been canceled.

A statement regarding Joanna Cherry’s participation in The Stand’s Edinburgh Fringe programme, which will no longer go ahead. For more on this, please visit: https://t.co/aUxnY6sjEU pic.twitter.com/xl0dtrs3lQ
— The Stand (@StandComedyClub) May 1, 2023

Cherry tells the BBC that "I'm being canceled and no-platformed because I'm a lesbian, who holds gender-critical views that somebody's sex is immutable." She also shares some of her controversial opinions in this interview, such as her position that convicted male rapists should NOT be allowed in women's prisons.

“This is what happens to women like me. We are constantly misrepresented and it leads to us being discriminated against.”

SNP MP @JoannacCherry reacts to being ‘no-platformed’ by the Edinburgh Fringe after staff said they were uncomfortable with her views on trans rights. pic.twitter.com/vr9Ir8Lzr9
— Times Radio (@TimesRadio) May 1, 2023

There are two big issues. One, comedy clubs don't cancel politicians they don't like. They welcome the politician to the club. Sit them upfront. Cover their two drink minimum. Then roast the shit out of them onstage.

Two, we have yet another example of how there is no common ground to find with progressives. I'm going to go on a limb and say a Scottish lesbian activist and an American right-wing blogger don't see eye-to-eye on many things. Yet if the ONLY thing we agree on is that male rapists should not be allowed in women's prisons no matter how that male says they identify, we can have a conversation.

If that is the only issue she and activists DISAGREE on, she is shamed and othered and told she can't sit with them.

Cherry also makes an important point about cancel culture. It's less the "cancel' as much as it is the "culture."

I'm someone in public life, a fairly privileged and powerful woman. If this can happen to me, just think about how much more likely it is to happen to women with less power.

Yep. It is almost as if that's exactly what woke activists want to happen.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Woke TikToker gets scared when restaurant sings National Anthem, blasts it as "white people things"
description:
Imagine being such a woke twat that the National Anthem freaks you out. That's the case with one TikToker who was sitting in a restaurant and was terrified. She referred to the incident as the most dangerous situation she has ever been in.

The following video... is the most dangerous situation this specimen has ever been in.

"By far the most dangerous situation I've ever been in" 🤡 pic.twitter.com/DlIhndNH3x
— Davy Jones (@itsNTBmedia) May 2, 2023

The restaurant is in California. You would think a more terrifying situation would be attempting to walk down the street. Yet, here we are. Getting triggered because your pancakes are being interrupted by, quote, "white people things."

Unclear is if she is referring to herself as a hashtag illegal, or if she thinks it should be illegal to sing the National Anthem in public.

Her fans had her back:

"Girl naurrrr I would be sweating" said one person.

"Anyone proud of america right now is a walking red flag" said someone who used the pronoun "Mx."

I think this is English: "this acc looks like a scene in a horror, u gonna stand up to leave of sumn and they all finna snap turn to fave u."

And this guy is such a loser, he included a Dungeons and Dragons reference. "This feels like a horror movie. Everyone stands up soon as the music plays as you find yourself been the only person not standing roll for initiative."

The Rainbow Oaks Restaurant plays the Anthem at noon every day, and even made the local news for it.

I didn't feel like going through this person's other TikTok videos. My guess is there is a response video claiming she is being bullied online and how everyone is racist.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: US Navy thought this seaman turned drag queen was their answer to record low military recruitment
description:
Our US military is facing a crisis with record-low recruitment in the armed forces. And while we're told by the media not to blame wokeness, the Navy has... yeah, I got nothing.

The U.S. Navy hired this non-binary drag queen as a “digital ambassador” to try to recruit people pic.twitter.com/l3LIEtndVD
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) May 2, 2023

Remember, whatever you do, we're begging you... don't blame wokeness for the record-low military recruitment. If you are blaming wokeness, stop doing that thing.

The Daily Caller has the scoop here. The seaman in question is Yeoman 2nd Class Joshua Kelley on the deck, "Harpy Daniels" below the deck. Harpy was brought on as the first "Navy Digital Ambassador” last November. The Navy is facing a historic recruiting crisis and is attempting different ways to reach younger recruits.

“An effort is, indeed, being made to connect recruiting to the interests and concerns of Gen-Z,” Lt. Ian Clark and PO Third Class Kyle Atkinson, U.S. Navy wrote for the USNI journal in January 2023, citing a prominent Diversity and Inclusion section that appeared on the Navy recruiting website’s front page at the time.

This pilot program concluded last month. Presumably, smart people in their administration are now evaluating the initiative before deciding to go further.

You have to question who the audience is for this, and there is a degree of "how do you do fellow kids" to it. Someone saw on the news that drag queens are popular with the youths and believed by highlighting that the Navy hearts queens too, Zoomers will come a-runnin' to the nearest recruitment office. Even though if you drew a Venn diagram of the 25% of Zoomers who claim they are LGBTQAIIP+EIEIO now vs people who hate the military-industrial complex, you'd have most of a circle.

Rumors of the Department of Defense sending Dylan Mulvaney on a USO tour with Hologram Bob Hope saying "a reminder of what you boys are fighting for" could not be confirmed at this time. Though I'm sure Dylan would slay in whatever Dylan was wearing.

>

<
